seodesc: Let us know how we can help you with your needs for a search system

leftSection.title: Hi! There are two ways to get a demo
leftSection.desc: You can book some time with us on the right and we can give you a live demo, or if you want to play around with openobserve yourself, you can create a free account, and then we have an option for you to import sample data.
